name: Water Tank Tank
description:
Lets call it a prototype, I fully intended this to be a complete (full game, multiple levels, sound, etc.) submission to the friendship jam... ah well, my skills at estimating what I can accomplish in two weeks are getting better at least. 

You join a group of lizard-like creatures in the desert. In the full version there would be a whole bit of becoming a friend and contributing team member to the crew. Use your imagination for now. >_<
